headline: Lumanu and Visa join forces to fix broken creator payments

headline: How The Latest Analyst Shifts Are Rewriting The Story Behind Visa’s Valuation
summary: Visa’s fair value estimate has nudged up to about $396 from roughly $391 as analysts bake in slightly stronger long term revenue growth of about 10.2% and a modestly lower discount rate near 7.39%, reflecting growing confidence in the resilience of its global payments franchise. Street research remains broadly constructive, pointing to Visa’s network scale, cross border tailwinds, and value added services as reasons the company can keep compounding through macro noise. Read on to see what is...

headline: 2 Financials Stocks with Exciting Potential and 1 We Turn Down
summary: Financial firms serve as the backbone of the economy, providing essential services from lending and investment management to risk management and payment processing. Still, investors are uneasy as companies face challenges from an unpredictable interest rate and inflation environment. These doubts have certainly contributed to the indutry's recent underperformance - over the past six months, its 7.9% gain has fallen behind the S&P 500's 14.3% rise.
